snippet: Gov. Rick Perry said Texas will step in if the federal government cuts financing over the state’s opposition to Planned Parenthood.
abstract: Gov Rick Perry, responding to intensifying criticism about the Texas government’s decision to exclude Planned Parenthood from a health care program for low-income women, announces that the state would use its own money to operate the program if Washington follows through on threats to cease financing.

byline.original: By EMILY RAMSHAW and PAM BELLUCK

lead_paragraph: Gov. Rick Perry said Texas will step in if the federal government cuts financing over the state’s opposition to Planned Parenthood.

headline.seo: Perry Pledges to Finance Texas Medicaid Women’s Health Program
headline.main: Perry Pledges to Finance Texas Women’s Health Program
headline.print_headline: Perry Pledges to Finance Texas Women’s Program
